import requests
import json
from datetime import datetime

# Replace with your actual instrumentation key
instrumentation_key = "a1609846-e819-4880-976a-de745a22203f"
endpoint = "https://uksouth-1.in.applicationinsights.azure.com/v2/track"

# Simulate pipeline parameters
params = {
    "Stage": "RawToStd",
    "PipelineName": "horizon_raw_to_std",
    "PipelineRunID": "12345",
    "StartTime": "2025-09-02 13:02:56",
    "EndTime": "2025-09-02 13:04:38",
    "Inserts": 381882,
    "Updates": 0,
    "Deletes": 0,
    "ErrorMessage": "",
    "StatusMessage": "success",
    "PipelineTriggerID": "trigger_001",
    "PipelineTriggerName": "manual_trigger",
    "PipelineTriggerType": "Manual",
    "PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineName": "",
    "PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineRunID": "",
    "PipelineExecutionTimeInSec": "102",
    "ActivityType": "DataLoad",
    "DurationSeconds": "102",
    "StatusCode": "200",
    "AppInsCustomEventName": "ODW_Master_Pipeline_Logs"
}

# Construct the body
body = {
    "Stage": params["Stage"],
    "PipelineName": params["PipelineName"],
    "PipelineRunID": params["PipelineRunID"],
    "StartTime": params["StartTime"],
    "EndTime": params["EndTime"],
    "Inserts": str(params["Inserts"]),
    "Updates": str(params["Updates"]),
    "Deletes": str(params["Deletes"]),
    "ErrorMessage": params["ErrorMessage"],
    "StatusMessage": params["StatusMessage"],
    "PipelineTriggerID": params["PipelineTriggerID"],
    "PipelineTriggerName": params["PipelineTriggerName"],
    "PipelineTriggerType": params["PipelineTriggerType"],
    "PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineName": params["PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineName"],
    "PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineRunID": params["PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineRunID"],
    "PipelineExecutionTimeInSec": params["PipelineExecutionTimeInSec"],
    "ActivityType": params["ActivityType"],
    "StatusCode": params["StatusCode"],
    "DurationSeconds": params["DurationSeconds"]
}

# Final payload
payload = {
    "name": "Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Event",
    "time": datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + "Z",
    "iKey": instrumentation_key,
    "data": {
        "baseType": "EventData",
        "baseData": {
            "name": params["AppInsCustomEventName"],
            "properties": body
        }
    }
}

# Send to Application Insights
response = requests.post(endpoint, json=payload)
print("Telemetry sent:", response.status_code)
